author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Get rid of a few dead assignments and initialization in several sparse reco packages.
Issues were reported by the static analyze

#### PR validation:

It builds and the short matrix passes

No changes are expected in outputs whatsoever. The only real bug fix (which was pointed out by the dead assignment report) is in EcalTBWeightUncalibRecHitProducer.cc: if I'm not wrong. that code is not in use since a while already (@argiro)
title: Remove dead assignments in a few sparse reco packages
